## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                    | Type                                    | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Color, Entered as one of the color. Can be one of: 'default', 'white'.         | `"main" \| "white"`                     | `'main'`    |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size, Entered as one of the size. Can be one of: 'small', 'standard', 'large'. | `"default" \| "extra-small" \| "small"` | `'default'` |
| `type`   | `type`    | Type, Entered as one of the type. Can be one of: 'paged' \| 'fast'.            | `"fast" \| "paged"`                     | `'fast'`    |
